job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a key role in the development and delivery of our mobile Apps. You will work as part of a team of engineers, designers, and product managers to develop innovative solutions that meet the needs of our growing user community, empowering them to get the most from our products and services. You will be responsible for designing and implementing systems that interact with our evolving AI-powered platform, as well as ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.

   What you will do:
     * Designing, developing, testing, maintaining, and deploying software in the Flutter framework and Dart language.
     * Developing user interface components and implementing them by following well-known Flutter / Dart workflows and practices.
     * Communicating with product and engineering leads to implementing business and project objectives.
     * Code review of team members' commits as part of CI/CD cycle.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Flutter Engineer - Mobile

As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a key role in the development and delivery of our mobile Apps. You will work as part of a team of engineers, designers, and product managers to develop innovative solutions that meet the needs of our growing user community, empowering them to get the most from our products and services. You will be responsible for designing and implementing systems that interact with our evolving AI-powered platform, as well as ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.

   What you will do:
     * Designing, developing, testing, maintaining, and deploying software in the Flutter framework and Dart language.
     * Developing user interface components and implementing them by following well-known Flutter / Dart workflows and practices.
     * Communicating with product and engineering leads to implementing business and project objectives.
     * Code review of team members' commits as part of CI/CD cycle.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about how Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on mobile application development using Flutter and Dart, with a mention of interacting with an AI-powered platform. However, it lacks specific details about developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models, RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. The primary focus remains on traditional software development for mobile applications, making it fall under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's not a dedicated AI role.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Designing, developing, testing, maintaining, and deploying software in the Flutter framework and Dart language' and 'Developing user interface components', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, testing, maintaining, and deploying software in the Flutter framework and Dart language

job_tasks.justification: Developing user interface components is a direct software development task related to building the front-end of applications.
Communicating with leads to implement business and project objectives indicates an understanding and translation of business needs into technical work.
job_tasks.phrase: Communicating with product and engineering leads to implementing business and project objectives

job_tasks.justification: Code review as part of a CI/CD cycle is a standard practice in operations engineering for ensuring code quality and deployment readiness.
job_tasks.phrase: Code review of team members' commits as part of CI/CD cycle

job_tasks.justification: Promoting a feedback and knowledge sharing culture is a soft skill related to team collaboration and communication.
job_tasks.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and implementing systems that interact with an AI-powered platform, which falls under software development, even if the AI part is not the primary focus of the engineer's development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our evolving AI-powered platform

soft_skills.phrase: Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture
empowering them to get the most from our products and services
